places_with_reviews.name: Bangaram

reviews.text: OMG, the island is stunning but even more stunning and amazing is the staff there. I have never seen such beautiful hospitality anywhere in the world. Try Lakshadweep instead of Maldives and you will know what I am talking about!
It's wonderful place for vacation ever I seen before. It's very beautiful and clean beaches.
Awesome beach. Best in India to enjoy cool, calm, scenic beauty and rejuvenate. Awesome for watersports including scuba, snorkeling, kayaking etc. Must go place. Add in your bucket list.
A place every person should visit ...
Amazing island and the resort staff was so nice. Had a wonderful time.
